excerpt: This protein-packed dish is perfect for a healthy and flavorful dinner.

ingredients.name: Bell peppers
ingredients.notes: tops cut off and seeds removed

instructions.name: Quinoa and Veggie Mix
instructions: In a medium saucepan, bring the vegetable broth to a boil.
Add the quinoa, cover and cook on low heat until all the liquid is absorbed, about 15 minutes.
In a skillet over medium heat, heat the olive oil.
Add the garlic and red onion, and cook until softened, about 3 minutes.
Add the zucchini and tomato, cook until tender, about 5 minutes.
Add the cooked quinoa to the skillet and stir to combine. Season with salt, black pepper, and paprika. Remove from heat.
Stuff each bell pepper with the quinoa and veggie mixture. Place in a baking dish.
Bake in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes.

instructions.name: Cheese Topping
instructions: Remove the stuffed bell peppers from the oven and sprinkle with feta and mozzarella cheese.
Return to the oven and bake for an additional 5-10 minutes or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
